title: Bubbles formed on the left side of my Pixel 3. Phone has lived inside a case since Day 1.
content:
Bubbles formed on the left side of my Pixel 3. Phone has lived inside a case since Day 1.

Google rep "MJ" thinks it is a non issue by saying "It is a cosmetic damage since it just appeared suddenly".

How can a part of the phone that's never been exposed be cosmetically damaged?

MJ has also denied request for escalating this matter.

Do I need to go to court to get this manufacturing defect resolved?
